FY.video: Video of winter weather at McMurdo Station in Antarctica.

EY.video: Video of winter weather at Mawson Station in Antarctica.

Dc1.video: Drone footage of South Georgia in the summer.

Cc1.video: Footage of Heard Island. The green coastal areas have a Cc1 climate, one of the rarest climates on earth. The average refrigerater could be said to have a Cc1 "climate"

Cc2.video: Footage of Macquarie Island. The entire island has a Cc2 climate

Cb1.video: Drone footage of the Faroe Islands
